name: Gunman's Journey
description:
Gunman's Journey is a short top down insta-death shooter where the goal is extremely simple: Kill all the enemies and find the portal before time runs out. 11 Levels of descent into the place where all heroes go regardless of what they do.

Developers Note: This is the first game I have properly finished, It's kinda wacky so don't expect Top Quality™ experience but It's still fun in it's way. If you have any suggestions definitely leave them in the comments.
